animeDescription: The members of Ohka-kai heard of a rumor of an equipment called "kondara" (Japanese slang of a roller used to level the ground), which is essential to baseball. As they discuss what a Kondara is, the hot debate goes causes the excited members to get confused. Finally, Koume decides to look for a kondara, but Anna is also excited and cannot be counted on.
animeStaff: [['Motoyama Satoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Hattori Takayuki', ['Music']], ['Kamimoto Kanetoshi', ['Chief Animation Director', 'Character Design']]]
